Articles.Content:
everything was fine yesterday , but today  im getting stuck on mods loading for eg if i remove the one getting stuck the game seems to find an other to get stuck on ,,, i normaly can fix this myself but this time its wierd ,, when the game gets stuck on loading a mod my graphics card will start burning  up going from 45"C:\Users\jvgre\OneDrive\Desktop\My Junk\Pictures\Screenshots\Screenshot (7).png"c to 89c  in 2 min and i fear if i keep it running its will damage my card, keep im mind its over a 100 mods  but i can get it running perfect just  not today        one pic shows it stuck                          my list is here somewhere. 

Edited February 6, 2023 by Gargamel
Removed linked mod list and lots of white space

@mrgreco1, I’ve removed the list of mods and all that extra white space as it contained some weird links.  
 

Upload your images to a image sharing site like imgur, and your logs and mod list to a filE hosting site like Dropbox.   
 

logs can be found here:
where would log files be located ? i can never find these
